001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.avaje;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.function.Supplier;
005
006import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
007
008import io.avaje.config.Config;
009import io.avaje.config.Configuration;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
014import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
015
016/**
017 * Makes avaje provide properties to RainbowGum.
018 * <p>
019 * If {@link io.avaje.config.Configuration} is already bound in the
020 * {@link ServiceRegistry} it will be used instead of the Avaje's default static bound
021 * Configuration.
022 */
023@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
024public final class AvajePropertiesProvider
025                implements RainbowGumServiceProvider.PropertiesProvider, RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator {
026
027        private final Supplier<Configuration> configurationSupplier;
028
029        /**
030         * For service loader.
031         */
032        public AvajePropertiesProvider() {
033                this(() -> Config.asConfiguration());
034        }
035
036        AvajePropertiesProvider(Supplier<Configuration> configurationSupplier) {
037                super();
038                this.configurationSupplier = configurationSupplier;
039        }
040
041        @Override
042        public List<LogProperties> provideProperties(ServiceRegistry registry) {
043                var config = registry.putIfAbsent(Configuration.class, configurationSupplier);
044                var props = new AvajeProperties(config);
045                registry.put(AvajeProperties.class, props);
046                return List.of(props);
047        }
048
049        @Override
050        public boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass) {
051                var registry = config.serviceRegistry();
052                var props = registry.findOrNull(AvajeProperties.class);
053                if (props != null) {
054                        props.configuration.onChange(e -> {
055                                config.changePublisher().publish();
056                        });
057                }
058                return true;
059        }
060
061}
062
063class AvajeProperties implements LogProperties {
064
065        final Configuration configuration;
066
067        public AvajeProperties(Configuration configuration) {
068                super();
069                this.configuration = configuration;
070        }
071
072        @Override
073        public @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
074                return configuration.getNullable(key);
075        }
076
077        @Override
078        public String description(String key) {
079                var entry = configuration.entry(key).orElse(null);
080                String source = entry == null ? "AVAJE" : "AVAJE(" + entry.source() + ")";
081                return source + "[" + key + "]";
082        }
083
084}
